name: Cyberflight
description:
Cyberflight is made by a team of one (me) and I hope you enjoy playing it as much as I enjoyed making it. It's my personal tribute to the 80's, and I wanted to capture that atmosphere with colorful visuals, a sense of speed, adrenaline and excitement, backed by a lush, original new wave soundtrack. All that for the price of a hipster donut!

This game will give you:
+ Exciting, high speed flight,
+ Through a detailed, procedurally generated city,
+ Rendered in ambient, atmospheric 3d,
+ Driven by an original 80's soundtrack
